notesStmt.note: Numerous works by several different authors each have special t.p.
Cf. Grolier club, New York. Catalogue of original and early editions of some ... English writers from Wither to Prior. New York, 1905. v. 3, p. 95-96.
Imperfect: all but first 86 pages lacking in filmed copy.
First collected edition, first issue; probably a private issue presented by the author to his friends.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
